text: Deutsche Schule Bogotá () is a German international school in Bogota, Colombia. It serves levels Kindergarten through Bachillerato/Sekundarstufe (senior high school). "Niveles Educativos"/"Bildungsebenen." Deutsche Schule Bogotá. Retrieved on 16 March 2015. title: Deutsche Schule Bogotá
